document.full_text: maria sharapova reached her first final in more than seven months and looked back to her best with a 3-6 6-0 6-2 victory over germany's giant-killing andrea petkovic at the sony ericsson open on thursday.
document.title: sharapova overpowers petkovic to reach final
lines_and_colors: maria sharapova reached her first final in more than seven months and looked back to her best with a 3-6 6-0 6-2 victory over germany's giant-killing andrea petkovic at the sony ericsson open on thursday.
